title: 艺术竞赛中心页-故事
content:
[[=]]
+ 本组获奖作品：DrFrog的//铃者诗章//
[[/=]]

[[module css]]
.content-panel {
    border: none;
    border-radius: 0px;
    background-color: #fff;
    margin: 10px 0 15px;
    box-shadow: none;
    box-shadow: none;
}
[[/module]]
[[div class="content-panel left-column"]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-tales/DrFrogBellerverse.png| caption= 来自Dr Frog的[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/Bellerverse 铃者诗章]。大图请点[https://i.imgur.com/vxGKWpt.png 这里]。]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-tales/techaartBees.png| caption= 来自https://techaart.tumblr.com的[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/Bees 蜂日记]。 大图请点[https://i.imgur.com/qdLxeoU.png 这里]。]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-tales/Sirawsmface64.png| caption= 来自Sirawsmface64的[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/Doctors-of-the-Church-Hub 教会博士]。 大图请点[https://i.imgur.com/KXsyKsQ.png 这里]。]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-tales/surumerume.png| caption= 来自surumerume的[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/Long-Live-the-King 吾王万岁]。大图请点[https://i.imgur.com/w5iW59F.png 这里]。]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-tales/Akumeoy.png| caption= 来自Akumeoy的[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/Revenants 归来者]。大图请点[http://www.scp-wiki.net/local--files/quote-unquote-art-by-cww/AkumeoyTales.png 这里]。]]


[[/div]]
[[div class="content-panel right-column"]]


[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-tales/Flawed.png| caption= 来自Flawed的[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/Document-recovered-from-the-Marianas-Trench 回收自马里亚纳海沟的文档]。大图请点[https://i.imgur.com/vapUgHU.png 这里]。]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-tales/HerculesRockefeller.png| caption= 来自Hercules的[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/On-Mount-Golgotha-Hub 在各各他山上]。大图请点[https://i.imgur.com/AIF8Ukt.png 这里]。]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-tales/Faut.png| caption= 来自Faut的[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/stop-going-in-circles 停止进入循环]。大图请点[https://i.imgur.com/eP9uQA2.png 这里]。]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-tales/PerelkaL.png| caption= 来自Perelka_L的[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/The-Stars-Do-Not-Wait-For-You 群星不待]。大图请点[https://i.imgur.com/tuk5D7S.png 这里]。]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-tales/Kenoma.png| caption= 来自Kenoma的[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/12talesaboutafactory 工厂的十二个故事]。 大图请点[https://i.imgur.com/wYVTwHi.png 这里]。]]
[[/div]]
author: GazerPara
